column5: chat and yak lets here it all.             Well the chat room is not  to busy. And I  have never  seen a person in there. And I check it all  the time .   SO  does anyone out there use or have a chat line room that is ( HOT FOR FISHING ) I am knot so good on the key board so I would like a room that offers voice chat . Is there such a room for people like ME.
